statement:
gsumsnd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumsnd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumsnd.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. V ) $.
gsumsnd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. B ) $.
gsumsnd.s $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> A = C ) $.
gsumsnfd.p $e |- F/ k ph $.

gsumsnfd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> A ) ) = C ) $.
